entities.name: professor
entities.description: The professor is mentioned as someone who adds interest to the game, but no further details are provided.

entities.name: warrington
entities.description: Warrington is a wizard who has been hit by Bludger from Crabbe. He is also mentioned as someone who dodges Warrington's spell.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a wizard who hits Warrington with a Bludger.

entities.name: montague
entities.description: Montague is a wizard who catches the Quaffle and is hit by a Bludger from George Weasley. He drops the Quaffle, which is caught by Katie Bell.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as someone who hits Montague with a Bludger.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is a witch from Gryffindor who catches the Quaffle dropped by Montague and reverse passes it to Alicia Spinnet.

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: Alicia Spinnet is a witch who receives the reverse pass from Katie Bell and takes the Quaffle away.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is a commentator who provides play-by-play commentary of the game, including the actions of the players and the crowd's reactions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who listens to Lee Jordan's commentary through the wind and din of the crowd.

relationships.description: Crabbe hits Warrington with a Bludger, as mentioned in the commentary.
George Weasley hits Montague with a Bludger, causing him to drop the Quaffle.
Katie Bell reverse passes the Quaffle to Alicia Spinnet, who takes it away.
